duties_responsibilities.duty: Contribute to oncology discovery and clinical development through the analysis of high dimensional data from oncology clinical trials, real world evidence datasets, and biomarker strategy.
Formulate scientific questions into coherent analytical efforts and develop rigorous statistical modeling and bioinformatics methods.
Integrate large-scale multi-modal datasets to derive quantitative biological insights and communicate scientific findings to project teams.
Play an integral role in a multi-disciplinary team focused on developing new therapies for the treatment of cancer.

education_certification.credential: PhD. Degree in bioinformatics, computational biology, statistics, mathematics, computer science, genomics, cancer biology, immunology, or a related field.
Master’s degree with typically 2 years of experience.
Bachelor’s degree with typically 5 years of experience.
